item.title: Kansas City Fed's Schmid shows hesitation about widely expected September rate cut
item.description: The policymaker pushed back on market pricing that points strongly to the FOMC lowering its key borrowing rate next month.

item.title: Not in the cards: Why some suspect stable trade may not follow Trump's tariff deals
item.description: Many on Wall Street caution that turmoil surrounding trade between the U.S. and its major partners is far from over.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Coty, Paramount Skydance, Walmart and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Walmart, Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Instacart, Broadstone Net Lease and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Trump immigration policy may be shrinking labor force, economists say
item.description: If a reduction in the immigrant labor force is sustained, it would likely pose problems for the U.S. economy, some economists said.
